snippet: The dancer Sylvie Guillem, whose program “6000 Miles Away” comes to the David H. Koch Theater on Wednesday, has had a singular career, going from ballet to contemporary dance.
abstract: Dancer Sylvie Guillem is bringing her 6000 Miles Away performance to the David H Koch Theater, a program that features work by choreographers Mats Ek, William Forsythe and Jiri Kylian; is well known for her ability to move seamlessly between classic ballet and modern dance.
lead_paragraph: The dancer Sylvie Guillem, whose program “6000 Miles Away” comes to the David H. Koch Theater on Wednesday, has had a singular career, going from ballet to contemporary dance.

headline.seo: Sylvie Guillem’s ‘6000 Miles Away’ at David H. Koch Theater
headline.main: An Impeccable Étoile Dared to Be More
headline.print_headline: An Impeccable Étoile Dared to Be More
